quest.name: Ants in the Pants
journal:
Eshana needs help with a vermin outbreak.

objectives: Use the marid's Trample ability on Velodyna ants in Virdjala.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Now that you have grown accussstomed to riding marids, there is a task I would asssk of you.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: We have been sssuffering an outbreak of ants. They are drawn to kitchen ssscraps from the lodgings, and are causing our patrons no end of grief, getting into their unmentionables among other unpleasant places.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: If we are to have any ressspite from these pests, we must ssstrike them at their nest. I would have you do the honors upon one of our trusssty marids.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: If we are to have any ressspite from these pests, we must ssstrike them at their nest. I would have you do the honors again upon one of our trusssty marids.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Speak with Dakshina, our maridkeep, and she will furnish you with further inssstructions.

dialogue.name: DAKSHINA
dialogue.text: I have been expecting you, ant-ssslayer. Your task is sssimple: hop on a marid, ride it over to Virdjala, and have it trample ants. We have placed bait there to lure them out.

dialogue.name: DAKSHINA
dialogue.text: Once you have finished the task, feel free to disssmount your marid. It will make its own way back here.

dialogue.name: DAKSHINA
dialogue.text: Want to get back on the marid, do you? Very well.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: I could feel the marid's mighty ssstomping all the way here. That should keep us free of antsss for a time.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: I could feel the marid's mighty ssstomping all the way here. That should keep us free of antsss for a time.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Ours is a harsh land with little to sssustain life, and the creatures only do what they must to sssurvive. That being said, we cannot well allow them to overrun the area.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: The people's sssafety is our priority, and today you have done your part to ensure it. Pleassse accept this as token of our appreciation.

dialogue.name: DAKSHINA
dialogue.text: Judging by the sssticky mess on the marid's feet, I sssee you have dealt with the antsss. Go on and report back to Eshana.
